name: Solitaire: Classic
description:
Solitaire also known as Klondike is a great puzzle game!
Features:
- "Solution" can show how to win
- Gesture function makes operation more convenient
- Daily Challenge with three challenge types
- Haptics (Requires iPhone7 or later)
- Random / Winning Deal
- Standard / Vegas / Vegas Cumulative scoring mode
- Draw 1 / Draw 3 cards
- Portrait / Landscape screen mode
- Right / Left handed mode
- Custom Card Face / Card Back / Background / UI
- Game status saving any time
- Intelligent Hint
- Unlimited Undo
- Auto complete
- Fun Animations
- Statistics
- Multi-language support
- Remove Ads

Game Tips:
- Swipe right in the game scene can quickly quit the game.
- Click on the title in the game scene can view game information.
- Tap the screen when playing the game ending animation can skip it.
- Continuously click the hint button when have multiple moving methods to display more moving methods.
- Click on the calendar icon in the Daily Challenges calendar interface can quickly jump to today's challenge.
